basics.name: Andrea Neenu Jose
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Data Scientist with experience in LLM applications, machine learning, and computational physics. B.Tech in Engineering Physics from IIT Delhi.

work.name: Accenture Japan LTD
work.summary: Developing LLM-powered automation solutions and CI/CD pipelines for enterprise applications.
highlights: Developed a multilingual LangChain-Dify chatbot for automated ServiceNow form creation, reducing task time from 10-12 hours to under 15 minutes
Optimized JA-EN translations using prompt-tuned LLMs with Pydantic parsing and automated self-correction
Mitigated LLM hallucinations using chunking, few-shot prompting, and RAG-based grounding tied to verified records
Developed a Python-based Transfer Check Tool for cross-environment data validation in ServiceNow with Azure Key Vault integration
Automated chatflow testing via Dify's API, cutting testing time by approximately 90%
Built CI/CD pipelines using Ansible and Azure Pipelines for automated deployment and testing

work.name: Futures First
work.summary: Analyzed macroeconomic data and implemented interest rate models for trading strategies.
highlights: Analyzed 40+ years of macroeconomic data for the US, UK, and Eurozone to identify market trends
Evaluated central bank reaction functions and their impact on Eurodollar futures curves
Implemented interest rate models (Vasicek, CIR, HJM, Hull-White) in Python for forward curve plotting and trading signal generation

courses: Calculus, Linear Algebra and Differential Equations

awards.title: JEE Advanced 2020
awards.summary: Secured All India Rank 4381, top 3% of 150,000+ candidates

awards.title: COMEDK 2020
awards.summary: Secured All India Rank 130, top 2% of 70,000+ candidates

awards.title: AISSCE Merit Award 2020
awards.summary: Top 0.1% of 1.2 million candidates in Physics

projects.name: Crowd Panic Simulation
projects.summary: Designed simulation-based strategies using agent-based models and numerical schemes (Euler, RK4) to reduce fatalities in high-density panic situations, achieving a 70% reduction in death rates (Out of Equilibrium Group)

projects.name: Quantum Plasma Simulation
projects.summary: Validated Wigner-Poisson formulations and implemented a high-performance N-body simulation (PIC approach) with Python wrappers for a 10X visualization speedup

projects.name: Quora Question Duplicate Detection
projects.summary: Built an NLP-based ML pipeline using TF-IDF, Word2Vec, and hyperparameter-tuned XGBoost (log loss 0.362) for identifying duplicate question pairs
